name: unnerve

effect.sun-moon: Opposing Pokémon cannot eat held Berries while this Pokémon is in battle. Affected Pokémon can still use bug bite or pluck to eat a target's Berry.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Opposing Pokémon cannot eat held Berries while this Pokémon is in battle. Affected Pokémon can still use bug bite or pluck to eat a target's Berry.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Opposing Pokémon cannot eat held Berries while this Pokémon is in battle. Affected Pokémon can still use bug bite or pluck to eat a target's Berry.

short_effect: Prevents opposing Pokémon from eating held Berries.

flavor_text.sun-moon: Unnerves opposing Pokémon and makes them unable to eat Berries.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Unnerves opposing Pokémon and makes them unable to eat Berries.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Unnerves opposing Pokémon and makes them unable to eat Berries.
